head.citation-title: The Study of 3D Reaching Tasks on Visual Serving Using Quaternion
head.abstracts: Â© 2023 University of Kuwait. All rights reserved.The image-based monocular visual servoing is difficult to realize the grasping task on three-dimension. This study presented a method of quaternion on 3D reaching tasks of visual servoing. This method used a camera and a laser scanner to acquire the information of the images and the depth. Then the parameters of Jacobian matrix could be determined by the method of the quaternion. A particular constraint mechanism was also proposed to optimize the reaching trajectory of the robot. The simulation results demonstrated our proposed method could implement the 3D reaching tasks successfully and had a significant performance improvement compared to conventional methods.

grant-text.$: This research is supported by Special Fund for Bagui Scholars of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, under Grand 2019A08; The Basic Ability Enhancement Program for Young and Middle-aged Teachers of Guangxi, under Grand 2020KY10018.

coredata.dc:description: The image-based monocular visual servoing is difficult to realize the grasping task on three-dimension. This study presented a method of quaternion on 3D reaching tasks of visual servoing. This method used a camera and a laser scanner to acquire the information of the images and the depth. Then the parameters of Jacobian matrix could be determined by the method of the quaternion. A particular constraint mechanism was also proposed to optimize the reaching trajectory of the robot. The simulation results demonstrated our proposed method could implement the 3D reaching tasks successfully and had a significant performance improvement compared to conventional methods.
